name: HipFractureSurgery
title: Hip Fracture Surgery
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for procedures of hip fracture surgery.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for hip fracture surgery.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
